prompts.title: First Draft Writer
prompts.template: Draft a [FORMAT] about [TOPIC] for [AUDIENCE]. Keep it clear, practical, and under [LENGTH].

prompts.title: Clarity and Tone Review
prompts.template: Review this draft: [PASTE TEXT]. Suggest edits to improve clarity, structure, and brand tone.

prompts.title: Landing Page Copy
prompts.template: Write hero headline, subheadline, and CTA copy for a web page about [OFFER] for [AUDIENCE].

prompts.title: Prospect Outreach Email
prompts.template: Write a short outreach email to [PROSPECT TYPE] about [VALUE PROP]. Include one clear CTA.

prompts.title: Proposal Draft Assistant
prompts.template: Draft a proposal outline for [CLIENT] covering goals, approach, timeline, and expected outcomes.

prompts.title: Customer Reply Draft
prompts.template: Draft a response to this customer request: [PASTE REQUEST]. Tone: empathetic, concise, solution-focused.

prompts.title: Help Article Draft
prompts.template: Create a help article for [ISSUE/TASK] with steps, common errors, and troubleshooting tips.

prompts.title: SOP Creator
prompts.template: Create a standard operating procedure for [PROCESS]. Include purpose, scope, roles, and step-by-step instructions.

prompts.title: Bottleneck Finder
prompts.template: Analyze this workflow: [PASTE PROCESS]. Identify bottlenecks and propose 5 improvements with expected impact.

prompts.title: Runbook Draft
prompts.template: Draft a runbook for [SYSTEM/PROCESS] with prerequisites, steps, rollback plan, and validation checks.

prompts.title: Incident Recap
prompts.template: Summarize this incident log: [PASTE LOG]. Include timeline, impact, root cause, resolution, and prevention actions.

prompts.title: EHR Integration Troubleshooter
prompts.template: Create a troubleshooting checklist for an EHR integration issue using this context: [PASTE CONTEXT].

prompts.title: Vehicle Telematics Pipeline Check
prompts.template: Review this telematics pipeline summary: [PASTE SUMMARY]. Identify likely data quality issues and suggest validation checks.

prompts.title: Budget Variance Summary
prompts.template: Summarize budget vs actual performance from this data: [PASTE DATA]. Explain top variances and likely causes.

prompts.title: CFO Commentary Draft
prompts.template: Draft executive commentary for this monthly report: [PASTE METRICS]. Focus on drivers, risks, and next actions.

prompts.title: Scenario Builder for Capital Projects
prompts.template: Build best/base/worst-case scenarios for a construction project budget with these assumptions: [PASTE ASSUMPTIONS].

prompts.title: Regulatory Ratio Commentary
prompts.template: Draft a concise internal note explaining changes in key financial ratios using this data: [PASTE DATA].

prompts.title: JD Draft Assistant
prompts.template: Write a job description for [ROLE] including responsibilities, required skills, and success indicators.

prompts.title: Microlearning Builder
prompts.template: Design a 15-minute training module on [TOPIC] with objectives, key points, and a short quiz.

prompts.title: Factory Floor Onboarding Outline
prompts.template: Create a 30-day onboarding outline for a plant operations role with safety, quality, and process training milestones.

prompts.title: Contract Clause Summary
prompts.template: Summarize key clauses in this contract: [PASTE CONTRACT]. Highlight obligations, risks, and items needing legal review.

prompts.title: Regulatory Brief
prompts.template: Summarize this regulatory text: [PASTE TEXT]. Explain practical implications for [BUSINESS UNIT].

prompts.title: HIPAA Notice Draft
prompts.template: Draft a clear patient-facing privacy notice update related to [TOPIC], using plain language and compliant wording.

prompts.title: Developer Feature Launch Copy
prompts.template: Draft launch messaging for a new software feature targeting [USER TYPE]. Include value statement and 3 proof points.

prompts.title: Call summary and next steps Placeholder
